div.p: Relationship between the past and future global gridded anthropogenic heat flux (PF-AHF) data and Flanner’s data based on the annual mean anthropogenic heat flux (AHF) of the 100 largest cities in the world. ( a) shows the relationship between PF-AHF data and Flanner’s 2 data in 2005. ( b, c) are same as ( a) but for 2015 and 2030, respectively. The significance was determined using a two-tailed confidence t-test (P < 0.05).
